Parameters: int: The position of the first removed item.
int: The number of items removed.
onItemRangeRemoved(int, int).Description: Called when a range of items is removed from the ObjectAdapter.

onChanged().Description: Called whenever the ObjectAdapter's data has changed in some manner outside of the set of changes covered by the other range-based change notification methods.

Parameters: int: The position of the first inserted item.
int: The number of items inserted.
onItemRangeInserted(int, int).Description: Called when a range of items is inserted into the ObjectAdapter.

Parameters: int: The position of the first item that changed.
int: The number of items changed.
onItemRangeChanged(int, int).Description: Called when a range of items in the ObjectAdapter has changed. The basic ordering and structure of the ObjectAdapter has not changed.

ClassDesc: A DataObserver can be notified when an ObjectAdapter's underlying data changes. Separate methods provide notifications about different types of changes.
